name: Stack That
description:
This is made for the Brackeys Game jam with the Theme: Stronger Together.

We opted for Guns are stronger together. So instead of switching guns... you just stack them for intense firepower!
But be aware, the more levels you finish, the difficulty level will go up and your enemies will also start to stack their weapons.

Chaos will ensue!

Wietske Overtoom - Art, Programming
Jurgen Welschen - Programming
Thymo Boog - Programming, Sound
